title: Spiritual Healing
cleaned_text: | | | | | | |Pinnacle Death experience...||87%|| | Spiritual Healing's middle section riff was originally the opening riff for the track "Legion of Doom", which only appeared in demos and in the Scream Bloody Gore Aborted Sessions tape. The first riff from Living Monstrosity was from the title track of the 1985 Back from the Dead demo. Recording information: Recorded and mixed at Morrisound Recording, Tampa, Florida. Produced, recorded, and mixed by Death. Arranged by Death with studio assistance by Scott Burns. Identifiers: Barcode: 88561-2011-2 Matrix number (first press): 88561-2011-2 NIMBUS Matrix repress): DIDX-046529 1 user)||Modified by: |
